name: I Escape
description:
Gameplay video here:

This is the demo of the first horror game I am currently developing and still lot of things to be add. I hope you like it. For feed and suggestion send it to my e-mail llaneta.christianjay@yahoo.com

Game Feature:
*Claustrophobic Environments.
*Different Creature with different behaviours.
*30x30 Maze Scale.
*You can find object to help you escape.

Game Objective: Find your way out through this maze while avoiding the creatures that haunting.
